infos.value: Here, you can take your hard-earned items and exchange them for those of other colors or designs.
Utilize your excess items to acquire those you currently lack.
No doubt this will come of use to you when you are just shy of inventory and time is of the essence.
First, select the item you wish to obtain.
Where you make this selection will depend on the rarity of the item you want and the item you currently possess, so take note.
Next, select the item you wish to use for the exchange and complete the transaction.
As you can see, the basic operations are no different from Material Exchange.
However, the exchange of items related to your Job Lv. can be done directly from the Unit Details screen. Let us try that method as well.
• Exchange Shop •
Select the item you want and choose Upward Exchange, Downward Exchange, or Equivalent Exchange to trade at the corresponding rate.
• Reverse Lookup •
You can also perform Item Exchange from the Menu by accessing Units > Job Enhancing Materials.
• Upward Exchange •

• Upward Exchange •
Trade for items of higher rarity, such as using Azure Vision Spheres to obtain Rainbow Vision Spheres.
• Downward Exchange •

• Downward Exchange •
Trade for items of lower rarity, such as using Silver Vision Sphere to obtain Copper Vision Sphere.
• Equivalent Exchange •

• Equivalent Exchange •
Trade for items of the same rarity that belong to different elements, such as using Fire Alcrysts to obtain Water Alcrysts.
• Job Enhancement •
Trading Job-enhancing materials can be done directly from the Unit Details screen as well.
• Gauge •
Slide the bar left or right to change the number of items you wish to exchange.
• Exchange Details •
The original items depicted on the left will be exchanged for the new items depicted on the right.
• Item Exchange •
Proceed to a tutorial on Item Exchange?
Yes
No
